text: Tarapara tini yakhana tadera ud'dhara karena, dekho! Tara prthibite dauraâ€Œtmya suru kare an'yayabhabe. Ohe manabagosthi! Tomadera dauraâ€Œtmya bastutah tomadera'i birud'dhe, duniyara jibanera saman'ya upabhoga, tarapara amadera'i kache tomadera pratyabartana, takhana amara tomadera janiye debo ya tomara kare calechile.
